toc.value: Integrating Ehcache 3 with Spring Spring Cache

frontMatter.title: Integrate Caching with Spring Cache and Ehcache 3
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: In this article, we will look into some Spring Cache concepts and then integrate Ehcache 3.

prev.title: Externalizing Application Configuration With Spring Cloud Config
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: In this article, we would be looking at how we can externalize application configuration using Spring Cloud Config.

next.title: Circuit Breaker And Retry with Spring Cloud Resiliance4j
next.author: Amrut Prabhu
next.summary: In this article, we will be looking into how we can integrate a circuit breaker and a retry mechanism, to handle failures while making synchronous calls to another service.
